notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: A.M.S., H.A., A.M.A.K. Conducted the main experiment: T.H.H., R.S.Y, A.M.A.K. Measured the fungal related parameters: R.S.Y., A.M.A.K. Performed the metabolite profiling: H.A., A.M.S., M.A.-M. Measured the biological activities: M.A.-M., Analyzed the data: A.M.S., M.A.-M., A.M.A.K., T.H.H. Wrote the original draft: M.A.-M., T.H.H., Reviewed, edited and prepared the MS for submission: A.M.S., H.A., A.M.A.K. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
